price: Farawo aranavuga ati “Nimunzanire buri murozi wese w’umuhanga.”
arabic: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِكُلِّ سَٰحِرٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqāla fir'ʿawnu i'tūnī bikulli sāḥirin ʿalīmin
